message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a price that I think is a great value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,001
Alice, thanks for the offer.  That price is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. Would you consider $1,050,000?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,050,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,175,000
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,125,000?
I'm glad we're close, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000
